description.raw:
This adds logging to the GameLogicPlugin and a placeholder for the tunnel qualifcation world.

@scpeters: You can overwrite the tunnel qualification world file.  The key bit to include in your qual world is:

```
     <logging>
       <filename_prefix>subt_tunnel_qual</filename_prefix>
     </logging>
```
inside the GameLogicPlugin.

## Testing

Instructions are here: #!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/qual

To increase the score in the subt log file (which will only work while pull request #85 is NOT merged):

1. Drive a vehicle over the tunnel entrance.

2. `rosservice call /subt/artifacts/new '{pose:{pose:{position:{x: 140, y: 35, z: -20}}}, type: 0}'`
